Collecting and reviewing documents, electronic media, and physical evidence
Interviewing witnesses and subjects
Performing other duties as assigned

ability to work independently or as part of an investigative team
ability to manage multiple tasks and projects
ability to work well under pressure and tight time deadlines
ability to exercise discretion and independent judgment
